version_description: Fix an IIS FTP connection issue for non-english users.

* Extended keyboard for text editor on iOS 6.
* Added a "Clear All" button to clear log.

* Improved FTP connection performance
* Added XML syntax highlight and editing
* Fixed a connection issue with ftp.meekspace.org
* Fixed an encoding issue

* Fixed music/video streaming issue on iOS 8. To enable streaming feature, please turn on the "Media Streaming" option in app settings.
* Fixed a crash issue when saving photos into camera roll.
* Fixed an issue that files can't be opened in other apps.
* Additional bugfixes and improvements.

* Add new "Copy to" feature. It's able to copy files and folders between local and FTP server, even between two FTP servers.
* Merge "Upload" and "Download" features into "Copy to" feature.
* Add "Server Charset" option in connection settings for those ftp server which doesn't support UTF-8 charset.
* File timestamp is preserved during file transfer. This feature requires your FTP server supports "MFMT" command.
* Fix compatible issue with iOS 5 and iOS 6.
* Additional bug fixes and improvements.

* Add back "New Text File" feature.
* Additional bug fixes and stability improvements.

If you love FTPManager, please leave a quick review on App Store. This would encourage us to add more useful features.
If you have problems or suggestions, please send email to support@skyjos.com
Bug fixes
* Bug fixes and stability improvements

* Supports explicit FTP over TLS
* Supports SFTP connection with private key file
* Automatically discovers FTP servers in local network.
* Adds "Nearby Devices" feature for transfer files between iPhone and iPad.
* Supports RAW formats: NEF, CR2, DNG, ARW etc
* New slideshow user interface
* Displays folder summary
* Adds row actions on folder view for sending email, open in file etc.
* Fixes bugs

* Fixes an issue that app crashes when adding new ftp connection in 4G.
* Some of users reported FTPManager couldn't access their FTP servers. We found those servers are not correctly configured explicit FTP over TLS. We have to use plain FTP connection as default. If you want to enable "explicit FTP over TLS", please change the "Protocol" in the connection settings.

Recent Updates:
* Supports explicit FTP over TLS
* Supports SFTP connection with private key file
* Automatically discovers FTP servers in local network.
* Adds "Nearby Devices" feature for transfer files between iPhone and iPad.
* Adds Dropbox connection
* Supports RAW formats: NEF, CR2, DNG, ARW etc
* New slideshow user interface
* Displays folder summary
* Adds row actions on folder view for sending email, open in file etc.
* Fix a crash issue when playing slideshow.

* Added French translation
* Bugfixes

* Directly open *.log file in text editor.
* Added symbol link (slink and symlink both) support. (Donated by Benjamin)

We appreciate Benjamin donate us and support us to make symbol link feature. Thanks for all of users to stay with us and make FTPManager better.

* iPhone X support
* UI improvements
* Swipe guesture for connections: Delete, Edit and Duplicate Connection
* New cell actions for duplicating file
* Bugfixes

Bug fixes and stability improvements.

Thanks for using FTPManager.

* Compatible with iOS 12
* Support IPv6 network
* iCloud integration
* Displays FE File Explorer in "On My iPhone" of iOS Files app.
* Supports ePub books
* We redesigned the entire file transfer module. Now you can resolve file conflicts with "Replace", "Keep Both" and "Skip" during file transfer.
* Drag and drop to tranfer files within app.
* Drag and drop to tranfser files between apps (iPad only).
* Nearby file transfer: Directly transfer files between two nearby iOS devices without Wi-Fi or LTE connection.
* Sync files with FTP Servers.
* Covert photos from HEIC to JPG during file transfer. You can turn on/off this feature in app settings.
* The video in Live Photo can be included or excluded during file transfer. Turn it on or off in app settings.
* 15 seconds fast forward and rewind. Double tapping is for 30 seconds.
* Force landscape mode for videos on iPhone.
* Display video thumbnails on folder view.
* Add "Copy to" and "Move to" on context menu.
* Zip files with password
* Improves files app extension
* Bug fixes and stability improvements
* Bug fixes and stability improvements.

* Supported Putty private key file (*.ppk) for accessing SFTP server
* Improved file sync performance.
* Bug fixes and stability improvements.
Bug fixes and stability improvements

* New Brazilian Portuguese localization by Fábio Rodrigo Pinardi.
* Bug fixes and stability improvements.
* Bug fixes and stability improvements.
Bug fixes and stability improvements

* New Brazilian Portuguese localization by Fábio Rodrigo Pinardi.
* Bug fixes and stability improvements.
Bug fixes and stability improvements

* Supported Putty private key file (*.ppk) for accessing SFTP server
* Improved file sync performance.
* Bug fixes and stability improvements.

* Optimized for iOS 13
* Dark Mode
* Mulitple windows on iPad
* New Czech translation by Jakub Kučera.
* New PDF reader
* New file search with search scope
* Independent SFTP connection from FTP connection.
* Supports ED25519 SSH key for SFTP connection
* Backup photo album to server
* The sidebar on iPad can be hidden now.
* Keyboard shortcuts for iPad. Press "Command" key to show all keyboard shortcuts.
* The built-in FTP server is moved to app settings. And you can set FTP login account now.
* Bug fixes and stability improvements

Shoot us a review on App Store if you like this update.
Write to us (support@skyjos.com) if you have suggestions or problems.
Fixed a crash in text editor.
Fixed an issue that Office documents cannot be opened.
* Bug fixes and stability improvements.

* Improves media streaming feature

* Picture-In-Picture on iPhone (iOS 14).
* New file context menu (iOS 14)
* Support SFTP symbolic link
* Calculate and display total folder size on info panel.
* Support WebP image format (iOS 14)
* New ePub reader
* New built-in HTTP server
* Drag to select multiple files
* AirPrint txt and office documents
* Bug fixes and stability improvements

* Improves file transfer performance for SFTP connections.
* Unarchive 7z, bz2, gzip, tar.gz
